title: Sophisticated Shaoxing Escape near China's Meilong Lake
description: Discover Chinaâ€™s canal-filled city lined with a charismatic balance of new and old when you stay at the Crown Plaza Shaoxing, an IHG Hotel. The sophisticated hotel rests on the banks of Meilong Lake and is a visually vibrant piece of architecture that offers the perfect escape. Set off to explore the famed Sanwei Bookstore, savour Shaoxing wine at a local brewery or stay close to your stylish base and make use of the impressive indoor swimming pool before enjoying a drink at Lafiti Bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shaoxing, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 379 Shengli Road E,Yuecheng District, Shaoxing, China, 312000
